body_html:
Yes, it's expected that the names will stay the same. It doesn't really matter.

It's probably some weirdness because of the fallback to old-style pointwise behavior. @gchanan was that deprecated in 0.2? If yes we could probably remove support for it now.
body_text:
Yes, it's expected that the names will stay the same. It doesn't really matter.
It's probably some weirdness because of the fallback to old-style pointwise behavior. @gchanan was that deprecated in 0.2? If yes we could probably remove support for it now.
body:
Yes, it's expected that the names will stay the same. It doesn't really matter.

It's probably some weirdness because of the fallback to old-style pointwise behavior. @gchanan was that deprecated in 0.2? If yes we could probably remove support for it now.
